title: Implementing 'pwritev' function in WSL
body: As stated in this Github issue, the 'pwritev' function is not implemented in WSL at the moment. For example, this function is used by nginx to temporary write an HTTP uploaded file on the disk and right now i'm getting critical errors (= 500 http errors) from nginx (see full bug report). Would be great to add this feature in the future WSL versions!

comments.body: Need to run nginx and lua and cannot do without this. Please bring it fast.

I was on the Insider Preview releases for the past couple years and has no issues until a couple of months ago when I started getting update loops - updates would crash, then recover and then try again. Decided to clean install a standard release and now I get this issue... annoying. Not going to to try Insider Preview though, will just have to wait I guess.
Apparently the function will be available in a next release very soon: https://github.com/Microsoft/BashOnWindows/issues/1506#issuecomment-288169493
Getting nginx running under WSL is my only blocker in being able to get rid of Cygwin completely
